reviews.review_text: Pad Thai eggs for kids Pad Thai fish by special requested Red curry s shrimp   combo ^_^ Chicken Green curry without eggplant   and bell pepper as requested We are care about your cooking is a caring and nurturing act. It s kind of the ultimate gift for someone, to cook for them. Parking: Parking around the building and under the building area Wheelchair accessibility: International village mall at second floor or food court area
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for reviewing our foods! Please comeback and try more of our taste !!

reviews.review_text: I ve been eyeing this place for a while now and decided to give it a go. My god, was it good.  So good. I ordered the Drunken Noodles with prawns. The prawns were enormous and perfectly cooked. Every flavour was balanced and expertly executed. I will be coming here more often for sure to try the rest of the menu. I had no clue International Village had so many good options in the food court. The only advice I give is go easy on the spice. I ordered Medium spice with my noodles and, though I could handle it, I m at the age where the rest of my body is not too keen of a certain threshold of chillies onwards. I will be paying for this level of spice later. But for now, HOT DANG was it delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for discovering our tiny house :) we tried our best serve the most authentic Thai cuisine to your table. We used in-house recipe for roasted ground chilli flake to bring out spiciness and aromatic at most ! That s why our spicy is likely what you might experience in Thailand. We meant it, please try customized spicy level and comeback for mores.

reviews.review_text: Thank god I tried this place in the food court! It s so authentic and so good! The padthai is amazing and tastes exactly like what I had in Thailand, the durian sticky rice is also really delicious, such large chunk of durian! Recommend to all of you who don t know what to eat in this mall
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sincerely review :) We would love to have you again soon. Please comeback and try more  feel-like-home  taste @littlebangkok2

reviews.review_text: An absolutely delicious choice of food at the cafeteria in the mall. I was looking for a place to eat and the reviews from previous customers had all indicated two things: you should not miss this when your in the area and that the food is authentic as it is in Thailand. I couldn t pass and I agree with the previous customers and enjoyed the service and the food itself. The gentlemen at the cashier was very friendly by greeting me in Thai - it s appreciated. I ordered the Pad Thai and it was delicious. It had the perfect spice to it and the spring roll was just right. I loved the soup that came with it as it washed down the after taste. Next time I will try their soup and I will come by soon! Thank you for the experience today :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for an awesome review :) Please visit us again and try more of the Thai authentic taste with us @littlebangkokthaikitchen2

reviews.review_text: Ordered #4 combo, again ! Cashew stir fried with rice, spring roll, soup, salad & drink, all for $15. Tasty & neatly prepared by this loving Thai family ! I certainly recommend !
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming and enjoy our foods and services! We have more to offers, please come visit us again and try mores of Thai authentic taste :)

reviews.review_text: Sometimes you find the best food in the most unexpected places. Walking into International Village Mall for the first time, you might be taken aback by how empty and dead it feels, especially in contrast to the surrounding lively Gastown district. But you d be surprised by how alive the food scene is. Especially this little hidden gem. We had: Pad Thai Combo ($14.99 + $2 for choosing prawns) - one of the best Ive had, the flavour was a perfect balance of slightly sweet, savoury and a little kick of spice (you can adjust). The combo comes with the following: (1) a salad, (2) a spring roll, (3) a soup, and (4) your choice of a drink. The soup was clean and clear but packed with flavour. It was a clear sign that the chef is talented Tom Kah Goong (Prawn) ($14.95) - this is very reminiscent of the more popular Tom Yum soup but with the addition of creamy coconut milk. It was piping hot (seriously, be careful!) but I fought through the pain to gulp it down because it was so delicious! Those hot, sour, creamy flavours all melded together into an amazing concoction. Bites of mushroom, lemongrass, tomatoes, onions, and prawns throughout were delightful The fact that you re getting this level of restaurant-quality (and honestly much better than some restaurants) food in a little place like this is unbelievable. Theyre the sweetest and they obviously pour so much love into what they do. If you re ever in the area, I hope you ll consider stopping by this hidden food court! While its exterior may not seem particularly extraordinary, it holds some amazing flavours and wonderful people.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are very appreciate your thought and reviews. We would love to serve more of Thai authentic taste again @littlebangkokthaikitchen2.

reviews.review_text: Amazing authentic Thai food at accessible prices. Best pad Thai and mango sticky rice I have ever had outside of Thailand. The green curry is rich, satisfying, and has big, strong flavours. Best Thai food in Vancouver is in the food court of International Village Mall. Believe it or not! This is not fast food because its only two people (husband and wife) making authentic and amazing Thai food which should not be rushed. Just sit down and get excited about the amazing food youre about to eat. Wheelchair accessibility: On 2nd floor of International Village Mall, elevator or escalator will get you upstairs.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are appreciating our kindly understanding about waiting time. We are trying our best to serve fresh and delicious Thai foods for everyone. Glad you enjoy it and please comeback and try for more of Thai Authentic Thai foods.

reviews.review_text: I live nearby, and have eaten MANY meals here. Sams always working the cashier, with a great smile and friendly attitude. Ive tried so many of their dishes, and theyre all great. Some of my favourites are the Pad See Ew, spring roll, eggplant stir fry, and curries. You pick your protein or vegetable/tofu and level of spice. Ive had no problem asking for vegetarian options, in fact when I do, Sam asks if egg is okay- yes, he goes the extra mile to make sure your food is how you like it!  Tasty food, good portions. Hot Tip: They dont hold back on spice. I like spicy and I usually ask for mild. My partner usually asks for no spice. Vegetarian options: They have tofu or vegetable only versions of most of their dishes. I usually ask for no fish sauce, egg okay, and theyre always on point. Although, Im not sure if they even use fish sauce... I just always ask to be sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for genuinely review :) we are trying our best to serve the best kind of food that you like and would like to comeback for more of it ! Cheer!!

reviews.review_text: Absolutely my favorite Thai food in town. Food taste so authentic and the spice level packs the appropriate punch. I always feel very excited to pass the area and give myself the excuse to get their food. I try to order something different every time. Photo: half eaten Tom yum (sea food) and #27 pad kapao(usually less soupy but still incredibly flavourful!). Also love their Thai sweet and sour and ofc pad Thai.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow! Thank you for coming and visiting us again and again :) we come back and try more and more :) we would love to have to back again and we can make some other Thai flavourful dishes for you :)

reviews.review_text: I was craving pad see ew and massaman curry and this place delivered! So good, not to mention the reasonable prices! Will come back again for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your five star reviews. Please come back and try for more of our foods :)

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and kind, quick service. We ordered Pad Thai, Papaya Salad, Spring Rolls, and the best Green Curry we ve had in years! (All with Tofu) While the Pad Thai was a little too sweet for my liking, it seems to be a west coast thing and you will find that to be true most places. Also, for Americans looking for salad rolls in Canada, they seem not to exist at any Thai restaurant. But that s okay, it s still worth stopping for. This little restaurant sits in an International Mall food court. Dont let the fact that it s in a mall fool you. It s really good Thai food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for genuinely review and glad that you like our variety of foods we provides. We are trying our best to remain authentic Thai taste while merging local taste  as well. Please come back and try more of our foods and service :)

reviews.review_text: Wow best pad Thai I have had in a long time!! Service was excellent Vegetarian options: Good Food : 5/5 |
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Great to hear that our food meet your satisfaction!! Please comeback for mores !!

reviews.review_text: Pad Kra Pao is amazing!!!! I m usually not a big big fan of Thai food but this one has totally changed my mind! I ll definitely go back for other options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Definitely good choice for tryout !! Glad that you discover new taste of our foods. Please comeback and try for more :)

reviews.review_text: Food is fantastic and the service was so lovely. I got a green curry lunch special and pad Thai; both were excellent and a very generous amount of food. The person who served us was also really nice to my son, which I appreciated.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for coming and trying our foods and services. More is better than less. Hope that our foods and hearts will fill your empty tummy up :D and please comeback and try for mores.

reviews.review_text: Yum. This place seems pretty authentic. Delicious, fresh ingredients, with lots of crunch to the salad. Very Spicy is actually Very Spicy, which is perfect for me. Good portions for the price too. Ill definitely be back!

reviews.review_text: I ve tried a few dishes here like pad thai, kee mao and pad gaprow (photo) and enjoyed them tremendously. My fav so far is the kee mao as the flavours were balanced.  Good portions and for a combo u get a spring roll, broth and pop. Love it! I always ask for spicy and ask for a side of bird s eye chillies to kick it up. Dishes are fully customizable and the proprietors are the nicest people who always bring a smile. A great place to grab a spicy bite before a movie or event at Rogers Arena!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank for giving us lovely reviews. We would love to serve our heart-warm Thai taste again. Please revisit us @littlebangkokthaikitchen2

reviews.review_text: i went there on my winter vacation.  Most of the time Ive tried a few Thai restaurants in downtown Vancouver but only found them to be okay, except for this husband and wifes shop.  I came here twice during my vacation.  because really beyond the greatness of the food.  I also feel that you and your husband are very hospitable.  gave me two free mango sticky rice.  after the outing.  what I feel most happy is the sacrifice coming from them.  I appreciate it very much
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your review. Hope you enjoyed your meal. Hope to see you again!

reviews.review_text: They serve some of the best thai food outside of thailand. To make the experience even more authentic, I was greeted with a warm sawadee ka when I approached. The food was cooked fresh to order, the portions were perfect and the price was affordable. I ordered the pad thai and the green curry and both were to die for. 10/10 will be coming back again. It slaps, trust me.

reviews.review_text: their spicy is actually spicy!!!!! but u gotta tell them u want spicy fr. so good but Im ngl the spice did take over. took over the food, took over my bowels, took over my entire consciousness for a moment too def getting regular spice next time forgot to take photos cause the food was so good I just started vacuuming it up, but they got a Kha soi on their seasonal menu rn and its delicious Vegetarian options: tofu stuff Parking: Free 2h underground  parking Kid-friendliness: Its a food court Wheelchair accessibility: Im acc not sure but Im pretty sure they got an elevator

reviews.review_text: Most delicious Thai food in the Vancouver area and I ve tried 3 places. My toddler is a picky eater and she eats 2 bowls of the green Thai curry. So delicious, we get it about 2x a week and the man is so kind. Always gives her treats while we wait. I recommend this place to everyone! My friend even tried my recommendation and love it. Kid-friendliness: So kind to my daughter and always giving her snacks while we wait. Keeps her occupied. She now loves to greet him and show him whatever she s wearing and loves babbling at him. He s so good with kids.

reviews.review_text: Incredible quality and authentic Thai food! I did a large order from here for our weekly staff meeting and didnt know what to expect as apparently its in a food court, but I and the rest of my team were blown away! The portions were huge and the flavors were so complex it quickly became a fan favourite. We ordered some curries (green, red), soups (tom kha gai), and noodles (pad thai, pad see ew) and all of them were very well received. This will 100% be my go-to place anytime we want Thai food. Love this little gem!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We glad that you and your team like our food :) we are proudly serving the best fresh Thai food. Definitely visit us again to try more and more authentic taste of Thai foods. Cheer !!

reviews.review_text: If you are looking for the best Thai food in the city, his authentic hidden gem just might be it! In the food court of The International Village Mall, a cute couple runs it. They are very appreciative for your business and have great customer service. Unlike other food court eateries, she made our food to order. I ordered a veggie stir-fry and asked her to make it spicy for my boyfriend and she offered to include a spicy chili oil for him in case he needed more spice. I ordered a tofu red curry and it was delicious. Both orders came out hot and fresh from the kitchen. This place was way above what we expected! If youre looking for Thai food, Id definitely give this place a try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Congrat! You found us. Thank you for coming and enjoy our food with heart-warming service. We would definately love to have you back agian. Please check out our facebook page for more of Thai foodie we will offer. https://www.facebook.com/LittleBangkok2/ Most of all, we would love to have you agian soon!

reviews.review_text: We just had Pad Thai Combo and Kaprao Combo, and the food, service, price, the whole experience was great! We enjoyed both Pad Thai with Chicken and Kaprao with Shrimp, they were both delicious, along with other sides. The food was taking longer than you would expect to take at a food court but it wasn t too long and it s worth the wait (like how it would normally take at a restaurant). The staff was so friendly and kind, we wish their business all the best
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for kindly & patiently for our food :) Please visit us again for more Thai authentic food with us @littlebangkokthaikitchen2

reviews.review_text: Wonderful and thoughtful owners who are serving up delicious Thai food in a no frills location (food court). Had a delicious Khao Soi soup here that felt like a family recipe. Highly recommend as an authentic alternative that youll feel good about supporting.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sincerely review. And yes, we are proudly serve family recipe and make every dish fresh made :) thank you for coming and please be back to try more !!!

reviews.review_text: I went here back in late October for some lunch. I was surprised to see this place open since I wanted to see Wow Thai to open again. Staff told me Wow Thai is gone and the owner went back to Thailand. Anyways, the lunch combo sounded appetizing which really was. Pad Thai Combo ($14.99) was impressive. Pad Thai was freshly made it was yummy. Spring roll tasted okay, but salad and soup were pretty good. Food was quite flavourful overall. Ill become very indecisive about my lunch since Bali Thai (next door) is good as well. Little Bangkok Thai is pretty good; itll take me back to memories of my Thailand trips.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review! WE would love to have you again soon @littlebangkokthaikitchen2

reviews.review_text: The food is amazing   Ive been here a few times. My only complaint is that sometimes they take a really really long time to give you your food (40 minutes last time I went) or sometimes as little wait as 10 minutes, so its kind of inconsistent. I know is made in the moment and its part of how great it is! But it would be great if they warned you about the waiting time before proceeding with your order.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your comment. We will definitely take this to improve our service. Our uncle and auntie are trying our best to serve to the best and fresh made every dish :) Please come back try more and let us know more what can we better our service :)

reviews.review_text: This place is one of my favorite Thai place in the city! The food is made fresh for each order and it includes plenty of vegetables and meat, making it a balanced meal! Pro tip: add a dollar extra for their combo, you get a free side salad, pop, spring roll and soup!!
Thai Tea in Vancouver The work of the shop owners little mother Whoever comes to Vancouver, Chinatown area, International Village Building, 2nd floor, come try it
